lead_paragraph: In her “A Further Shore” series, the photographer Susannah Ray documents the many ways that those who live in the city connect with its waterways.
snippet: In her “A Further Shore” series, the photographer Susannah Ray documents the many ways that those who live in the city connect with its waterways.
abstract: Photographer Susannah Ray has captured images of people interacting with water around New York City, as summer begins, for project A Further Shore.
